com.example.bot.spring

Class Coupon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bot.spring.Coupon

  • public class Coupon
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is going to do the tasks directly related to the coupon This is a singleton class
    Since:
    2017-11-18

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Coupon coupon
      This is a private static member coupon to let the class be a singleton
      private int number
      This is a count number It counts the number that the amount of coupons have already been given out

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Coupon() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String code_call(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String code)
      This function is going to check when the user try to get the coupon It returns the user id of the coupon giver only if the user can get the coupon and the coupon exist And What's more, the code does not belong to the user and the coupon hasn't been sold out
      java.lang.String friend_call(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to generate a random 6-digit code and return it to the user The 6-digit code should be between 100000 and 999999 and it should be not already exist in the coupon table And insert the code and the user id into the coupon table
      static Coupon getCoupon()
      This is a singleton implementation of the coupon object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • coupon

        private static Coupon coupon
        This is a private static member coupon to let the class be a singleton

      • number

        private int number
        This is a count number It counts the number that the amount of coupons have already been given out

    • Constructor Detail

      • Coupon

        public Coupon()

    • Method Detail

      • getCoupon

        public static Coupon getCoupon()
        This is a singleton implementation of the coupon object. If there is already this object, then we don't create it again.
        Returns:
        coupon If there isn't a coupon object, we create a new one then return it. Else, we return the already existed one.

      • friend_call

        public java.lang.String friend_call(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to generate a random 6-digit code and return it to the user The 6-digit code should be between 100000 and 999999 and it should be not already exist in the coupon table And insert the code and the user id into the coupon table
        Parameters:
        id - The user id in order to insert
        Returns:
        code Return the coupon code to the user

      • code_call

        public java.lang.String code_call(java.lang.String id,
                                  java.lang.String code)
        This function is going to check when the user try to get the coupon It returns the user id of the coupon giver only if the user can get the coupon and the coupon exist And What's more, the code does not belong to the user and the coupon hasn't been sold out
        Parameters:
        id - The user id in order to check whether the user is able to get the coupon. It will check it in the user list table
        code - The coupon code the user type in the chatbot. We should check the code in coupon table
        Returns:
        result Return "1" if the user cannot get the coupon or coupon sold out. Return "2" if the user use his/her own code. Return "3" if the code cannot found in coupon table. And return the user id of the coupon giver if all the constrains are passed
